Sentencas: A hybrid system consisting of a CPC (compound parabolic collector) system, a SOE (solid oxide electrolyzer) system and a PEMFC (proton exchange membrane fuel cell) system was proposed to harvest solar energy.
Titulo: Performance analysis of a solar-powered solid state heat engine for electricity generation

Sentencas: And a sensitivity analysis was conducted to evaluate the system performance.
Titulo: Performance analysis of a solar-powered solid state heat engine for electricity generation

Sentencas: The impacts of operating temperatures of the SOE and PEMFC system, and the direct irradiation intensity of the sun on the performance characteristics were systematically analyzed.
Titulo: Performance analysis of a solar-powered solid state heat engine for electricity generation

Sentencas: Results revealed that there exists an optimal SOE operating temperature leading to the maximum power output and maximum electrical efficiency simultaneously.
Titulo: Performance analysis of a solar-powered solid state heat engine for electricity generation

Sentencas: Larger operating temperature of the PEMFC resulted in larger power output and higher efficiency.
Titulo: Performance analysis of a solar-powered solid state heat engine for electricity generation

Sentencas: There also existed optimal direct irradiation intensities leading to the maximum power output and maximum electrical efficiency.
Titulo: Performance analysis of a solar-powered solid state heat engine for electricity generation

Sentencas: Furthermore, the performance of the proposed solar energy harvesting system for practical use in real-life was also simulated.
Titulo: Performance analysis of a solar-powered solid state heat engine for electricity generation

Sentencas: This may serve a clean technology for electricity generation.
Titulo: Performance analysis of a solar-powered solid state heat engine for electricity generation
